channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Pyrotechnic
channel.description:
Watch as I shamelessly rip off the arsonist from ToS
Pyrotechnic - Neutral Killing Passive 1: Crazed - Night and Occupy immune Passive 1: Employed - Appear as BD to faction checks
Day ability: Ignite - Kill all marked targets at the end of the night. Bypasses everything. Anyone killed this way has their journal wipped(1 use)
Night Ability 1: Douse - Mark a target for ignition and occupy them. Still marks them even if they were immune to the Occupy.(Unlimited) Night Ability 2: Refuel - Gain another use of ignite (Unlimited)

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Pyrotechnic
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
1: Splitting the powers actualy makes him stronger than what he would be otherwise. If you have any suggestions for a second day ability however then I am up for suggestions

2: I thought it might be OP cuz douse isn’t stopped by knights or bear and an obs wouldn’t think anything is weird about it. But if you say so then ok.

3: Burning classes would actually be counterproductive because it would reveal that you were the killer. Blanking the journal is fine though

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Pyrotechnic
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
I like the idea, but it is more underpowered than the arsonist. Here’s some ideas to fix this:

  1. Combine refuel and ignite, and replace the current ignite with another day ability.
  2. Ignite should bypass heal.
  3. Ignite should destroy the class and journal of primed players(like ToS’s janitor).
